item.description:
Ok lets get out and unwind, this venue has a huge dance floor and this weeks band is great. I think if we meet to dance in the Sports Bar and those of you who want dinner can meet earlier in the restuarant  adjacent to the lounge,  I will need an assistant to do the intros in the restaurant some one that can come in a little early and  get a table or booth depending on how many takers for dinner.

  I will   be there for dancing and mingling and wil do my best to introduce any new comers and of cousre always love to see my friends who have been to busy to come out and play, we have not gone to this restuarant for quite some time so I say lets do it, No hassles, just rmember to be polite, tip your bartender and be responsible for taking care of your own tabs, we had alot of fun here in past meet ups.

This venue is posted with 4 other Meet Up groups.

 

Band starts 9pm

Rock City- (awesome band tunes of top 40's)

No cover charge, casual dress, see ya there :) you can reach me on my cell 978-857-6626

Please don't forget to RSVP dinner or dancing
item.how_to_find_us: Will be in the sports lounge

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Get out and Boogy/Eat because it's Friday!!!
